DESCRIPTION: Black Mana gauge you've accumulated by casting spells. Allows you to perform powerful combos.
White Mana gauge you've accumulated by casting spells. Allows you to perform powerful combos.
Add a card to your hand. Can only be added by this action. If you perform a Combo Break the card is exhausted.
After you have added a combo card to your hand, performing a different action than the como will Exhaust your combo card.
Powerful attacks that are chained together.
More powerful version of card of the same name.
